title: Nike Accuses StockX of Trademark Infringement in Sales of NFTs
sub_head: The online resale marketplace offers customers the chance to buy digital tokens associated with limited-edition sneakers
body:
Nike Inc. has sued StockX LLC, accusing the online marketplace of selling unauthorized digital products based on its sneakers.
The lawsuit, filed Thursday in New York federal court, is the latest dispute involving a brand over the sale of products known as nonfungible tokens, or NFTs.
